metadata.name: Neon City
metadata.description:
Behind these windows, gazing up at the stars, are entire universes - the dreams, hopes and love of the people, and their stories waiting to be told. Breathing the same air, walking the same streets, seeing the same landscape, taking the same subways, yet dreaming a different dream. Maybe that's why these lights shine so bright.

Thereâ€™s something remarkable about Toronto at night. The neon lights in the dense downtown neighbourhoods give it an otherworldly appearance. As sunset fades into twilight, the skyline comes alive with bright blue and yellow lights, like a swarm of fireflies determined to make even the darkness look beautiful.
